thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Mr Kenneth Macartney
thread.title_full: Rentalcars.com reviewed by Mr Kenneth Macartney

author: Mr Kenneth Macartney
title: Mr Kenneth Macartney
text:
I hired a car through Rentalcars.com to travel from Verona airport to Alpe di Siusi. The online process was quick and easy and the communication following my booking was excellent.
On arrival I was upgraded at no additional cost to an automatic car. My only problem was that I had ordered a 4X4 and my upgrade was not 4X4 which caused a few problems getting to and from our hotel on the slopes.
Overall a great experience and I will definitely use again.
